title: Controller
description:
*Responsibilities:*
* Financial analysis and internal consulting for management
* Reporting to local management and to German headquarters
* Costs calculation for investment projects, sales orders, etc.
* Profitability analysis by business division, by region, by product range
* Search for efficiency and improve business processes
* Support of special projects

*Qualifications and Requirements:*
* University or above, preferably studied abroad(for some time, e.g. Germany, US)
* Major in Business Administration: Controlling, Finance
* 3 years' working experience in foreign company or joint venture
* Solid knowledge in SAP R/3, ideally CO
* Language: Mandarin, Good English (both verbal and writing), German would be a plus
* Be professional at Microsoft Office, especially Excel, Powerpoint
* Analytical mind, systematic approach, able to advise management
* Be honest, loyal, reliable and hard working

*Interested in the following job opportunity ?*
The easiest way to apply is your online application. Please
send your English application with your resume and all
relevant certificates to recruiting.TH600@de.trumpf.com
* Do you have any questions? Tobias Unger (07156-303-32075) will be happy to assist you.
